title: Similarity between European and Asian immigrants

content.prompt: Which of the following is a similarity between European and Asian immigrants to the Americas during the nineteenth century?

choices.label: Both rejected the cultural traditions of their homelands.
Both were mostly from the upper and middle classes.
Both were exclusively from minority communities in their home countries.

topic.text: 6.6: Causes of Migration in an Interconnected World

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
